ğŸ‰ "IG Comments Exporter" is the perfect tool for Instagram users who want to export comments to Excel (.xlsx) or CSV files. Once installed, you can download comments in bulk with a single click, making it ideal for data analysis, archiving.

ğŸ’¡ Features
âœ“ Export comments to Excel (.xlsx) files.
âœ“ Export comments to CSV files.
âœ“ Exported data includes User ID, User Name, Avatar URL, Profile URL, Comment ID, Comment Text, and Publish Date.

âš™ï¸ Get Started
1. Enter the URL of the Instagram post.
2. Click the 'START EXTRACTING' button.

Additionally, we provide you with a variety of powerful tools in "moretools."

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
Your data privacy is paramount. All data processing occurs on your local machine; it never transits through our servers, ensuring no one else has access to your collected data.
